Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Central
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Augusta, Washington & Central, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Augusta, Washington then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Central
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Augusta, Washington & Laramie, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Augusta, Washington & Laramie, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Montrose/Austin
ShortDescription: Eastbound #80 buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Austin, Irving Park, and Montrose, due to a street blockage near Montrose/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Austin, Irving Park, and Montrose, due to a street blockage near Montrose/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to a street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to a street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
